answers.answer: Hi,The treatment of Hemiplagia starts with the treatment of underlying cause i.e – diabetes , high blood pressure or an elevated cholesterol . If  there is an infarct or tumour , surgery may be required . Anticoagulant therapy or blood thinners are usually given to prevent further strokes . The rehabilitation phase may comprise of physiotherapy , behavioral or occupational therapy and speech therapy . Good nutrition –multivitamins , multiminerals , omega 3 supplements , protein rich diet help in regeneration of nerves and improving muscle tone . Adequate rest and physiotherapy are very important . Recovery is slow and a physician and neurologist should be consulted in case the symptoms worsen . Hope this helps you . Take care and regards !
